alert.note: Alert for Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 11:42AM MST until January 02 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow...with moderate accumulations mainly above 7000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...In Colorado, Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus. In Utah, Tavaputs Plateau. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy to snowpacked road conditions. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
